Uses of Interface
ca.mcgill.ecse211.tools.MenuCommand

  • Packages that use MenuCommand 
    Package Description
    ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.menu
    Robot Menus For defining menu items for MainMenu, DemosMenu, TestsMenu, CalibrationMenu in their own classes.
    ca.mcgill.ecse211.tools
    Project Software Tools This package holds tools that are either not changed very often, or only extended from.

    • Uses of MenuCommand in ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.menu

      Methods in ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.menu that return MenuCommand 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected MenuCommand CalibrationMenu.calibrateBaseWidth()
      Creates a calibration tool that allows the user to recalibrate the base width, actively changing the BASE_WIDTH constant of the LocalResources class.
      protected MenuCommand CalibrationMenu.calibrateColorSensor()
      Creates a calibration tool that allows the user to identify the mean R, G, and B values of a given color detected by the physical color sensor.
      protected MenuCommand CalibrationMenu.calibrateUltrasonicOffset()
      Creates a calibration tool that allows the user to recalibrate the ultrasonic offset, actively changing the US_OFFSET constant of the LocalResources class.
      protected MenuCommand CalibrationMenu.calibrateWheelRadius()
      Creates a calibration tool that allows the user to recalibrate the wheel radius, actively changing the WHEEL_RADIUS constant of the LocalResources class.

    • Uses of MenuCommand in ca.mcgill.ecse211.tools

      Methods in ca.mcgill.ecse211.tools with parameters of type MenuCommand 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SubMenu.addItem(java.lang.String title, MenuCommand command)
      Adds a new user-defined action to the menu, given the title of the menu option, and an instance of the MenuCommand interface.
